titleStmt.title: Sermons preached upon several publike and eminent occasions by ... Richard Vines, collected into one volume.
Sermons. Selections
titleStmt.author: Vines, Richard, 1600?-1656.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.

Each of the following have separate t.p. : The impostures of seducing teachers discovered ... London, 1656; The purifying of unclean hearts and hands ... London, 1646; The hearse of the renowned, the Right Honourable Robert, Earle of Essex ... London, 1646; Obedience to magistrates ... London, 1656; Subjection to magistrates ... London, 1656.
